remarks: Move class substitution in and out of a function value.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-2005.)  Obsolete as of 20-Aug-2018.  Use ~ csbfv12 instead. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement: csbfv12gOLD $p |- ( A e. C -> [_ A / x ]_ ( F ` B ) = ( [_ A / x ]_ F ` [_ A / x ]_ B ) ) $.
